mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.username as user_username, u.password as user_password, ur.role as user_role_role, tl.id as task_id, tl.title as task_title, tl.description as task_description, tl.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, tl.status as task_status FROM tasks.user_list u LEFT JOIN tasks.user_roles ur on u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN tasks.user_task ut on u.id = ut.user_id LEFT JOIN tasks.task_list tl on ut.task_id = tl.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
